Html:
Hi,

I´ve downloaded ACS - Citation Sequence (superscript) style from here to be used in Word2010 but the citation numbers are not superscript.

Do you have any solution for this problem?

Check the FAQ. More specifically "How do I get my in-text citations in superscript?"

Also, the page you are referring to has a remarks section which answers your exact question in the last point.

I saw it already in the FAQ but it is not so clear to me what to do with that macro. Should I copy it somewhere?


From: [email removed]
